{"id":647379635,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1645612088,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"26 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/647379635/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"18.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        stack<int> s;\n        int res = 0, i = 0;\n        \n        while(i < height.size())\n        {\n            if(s.empty() || (height[i] < height[s.top()]))\n            {\n                s.push(i++);\n            }\n            \n            else\n            {\n                int x = s.top();\n                s.pop();\n                if(s.empty())\n                    continue;\n                \n                res += (min(height[s.top()], height[i]) - height[x]) * (i - s.top() - 1);\n            }\n        }        \n        \n        return res;\n    }\n};\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
